CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 30, 1957, pg. A19, reads: "PENGUIN BAR AND GRILL - The Penguin Bar and Grill, 512 Court Place, downtown, is open with delicious food and moderately priced liquid refreshments. in left photo, left to right, are proprietors K. Manolas, Nickolas Manolas; Sam St. Clair Gilliam, internationally known chef who has worked in many fine restaurants and can really cook steaks, chops, and chicken.  Next to him is waitress Dorothy Stallworth...  The Penguin features a variety of excellent sandwiches and the best in mixed drinks.  - Harris Photos. - Advt."
TitMainTitle: Penguin Bar and Grill with proprietors K. Manolas and Nickolas Manolas, and chef Sam St. Clair Gilliam behind counter, and waitress Dorothy Stallworth, 512 Court Place, Downtown
